surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
plow
Ili River in central Asia
Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture in Xinjiang
pinyin: Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: Treaty of Saint Petersburg of 1881, whereby Russia handed back Yili province to Qing China in exchange for compensation payment and unequal treaty rights
pinyin: Zhong1 E2 Yi1 li2 Tiao2 yue1

definition: the Yili basin around Urumqi in Xinjiang
Treaty of Saint Petersburg of 1881 in which Russia agreed to hand back Yili province to Qing China in exchange for compensation payment and unequal treaty rights
pinyin: Gai3 ding4 Yi1 li2 Tiao2 yue1

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地了解伊犁啊？

sentences.english: Yili area is one of the most abundant protected area in Xinjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 伊犁地区是新疆自然保护区数量最多的地区。

sentences.english: I didn't expect Ili's natural conditions are so good.
sentences.chinese: 我还真没想到伊犁的自然条件这么好。

sentences.english: But they are the celebrated Ili Red.
sentences.chinese: 这可是有名的伊犁红啊。

sentences.english: So far, in Xinjiang, Yi Li area still protogenesis walnut forest having large area.
sentences.chinese: 至今，在新疆伊犁地区仍有大面积的原生核桃林。

sentences.english: She is sleeping on the Ili Grassland.
sentences.chinese: 她就长眠在伊犁的草原上。

sentences.english: The Kashi River is one the Ili's three major tributaries.
sentences.chinese: 喀什河是伊犁河的三大支流之一。

sentences.english: Coccinellids had the longest temporal niche in wheat fields in both Tacheng and Ili.
sentences.chinese: 瓢虫类在塔城和伊犁小麦田的时间生态位宽度均较长。

sentences.english: The former city of Huiyuan was built by the first General of Ili.
sentences.chinese: 那当时的惠远城就是第一任伊犁将军组织建造的。

sentences.english: It is the Tekes River, one of three major tributaries of the Ili River.
sentences.chinese: 特克斯河啊，这是伊犁河的三大支流之一。

sentences.english: It was unearthed in Ili's Tekes County.
sentences.chinese: 这是在伊犁的特克斯县出土的。

sentences.english: Today, Han Jia and the General of Ili will take you there for a look.
sentences.chinese: 今天您就跟着韩佳，还有伊犁将军一起来看看吧。

sentences.english: Where is the Ili girl you praised just now?
sentences.chinese: 那你刚才赞美半天的那位伊犁姑娘呢？

sentences.english: They are the well-known Lizhamat Grape of Ili.
sentences.chinese: 这可是伊犁有名的力札玛特儿。

sentences.english: The Turpan grapes, Hami melons and Ili apples are all the best.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番的葡萄，哈密的瓜，伊犁的苹果顶呱呱。
